data.oai_dc:dc: Standard and maximum metabolic rate of three redband trout populations and a hybrid at 12°C, 15°C, 18°C, 21°C and 24°C. Maximum metabolic rate was achieved by exercise. Aerobic scope was calculated as the difference between standard and maximum rate.
Critical thermal maximum|maximum heart rate|metabolic rate|aerobic scope|OCLTT|Climate Change
